item.title: Understanding Reliability Risk
item.description: I started to read the « Google SRE » during my paid off from Nov 2021. Lots of suggestions, guidance, and knowledge are included in this book. I would like to understand and summarize key thoughts that are born from Google SRE. I can reference them to think about each of my decision to check if I am in the wrong direction or not. This blog will include my understanding of the second chapter – Principles .
